mapper.insert: insert into member (memberId, memberPw, memberName, memberGender, memberBirth, memberAddress, memberPhone, memberEmail, memberHobby) values (#{memberId},#{memberPw},#{memberName},#{memberGender},#{memberBirth},#{memberAddress},#{memberPhone},#{memberEmail},#{memberHobby})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM member WHERE memberId = #{memberId}
